archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: Scrap Interface; DB Schenker SAP --> Vestas SAP
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
Scrapping of materials in the system is performed by Schenker. Before Schenker is allowed to scrap materials ​they must first move the materials to the storage location TRD (1001) and Schenker must also have an approval​ from Vestas. ​ Schenker is scrapping materials by making a transfer posting using one of the following movement types:​ 551  (Withdrawal for scrapping)​ 552  (Withdrawal for scrapping – reversal)​ 553  (Withdrawal for scrapping from quality inspection stock)​ 554  (Withdrawal for scrapping from quality inspection – reversal)​ 555  (Withdrawal for scrapping from blocked stock)​ 556  (Withdrawal for scrapping from blocked stock – reversal)​
The created material document is interfaced to Vestas using the IDoc MBGMCR02 ​
At Vestas the following table needs to be updated: YPLMVCONV
Link to Documentation; https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/OneTool-T153PLrollout/Shared%20Documents/T15%203PL%20rollout/00%20Requirements%20and%20Process/Vestas%20-%20DB%20Schenker%20Interface.pptx?d=w8ae74256aee84e64a3c4764fa3b4d8bb&csf=1&web=1&e=PhplWf
